author: Marian Faa
title: 'Gut-wrenching': Travel permits rejected as Torres Strait residents fight to get home
description: More than 100 island residents are stranded on mainland Australia with no clarity about when they will be able to go home.
content:
Posted 
April 15, 2020 07:46:54
Torres Strait Island residents stranded in limbo on mainland Australia say they were given no warning before extreme travel restrictions were imposed, stopping them from returning home.
